  • Graphics: DirectX 11-capable video card from NVIDIA or AMD w/2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to changes during optimisation process.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
